Description: Part of the blade of a bifacial knife: of pale cream flint, roughly worked, with a thick back and poorly chipped edge. Broken off at each end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Anedjib, grave X1 (subsidiary)
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XV, group marked X, 3rd from bottom.
